data.oai_dc:dc: These data represent MALDI IMS data of biological replicates of mice infected with S. aureus 4 days post infection. This particular strain of S. aureus has been modified with a fluorescent reporter sensitive to manganese deplete conditions. Three biological replicates are tested here.
Imaging Mass Spectrometry|MALDI IMS|LA-ICP-IMS|Live animal imaging|Magnetic resonance imaging
